name: Super Stick Hero Warrior Fight
description:
Super Stick Hero Warrior Fight :
Check it.... After downloading the game, you find yourself in a virtual world where a deadly battle between stick! You'll have to fight sparing no effort, perform tricks, show the skills of a warrior and become the best jedi!It will be the most addicting games that you ever play. If you are fan of stick games you'll enjoy this battle.

MANY LEVELS AND BOOSTERS
On each level you are waiting for the arena, which will host an exciting fight! Fighter have an arsenal of weapons, skins, boosters, and acceleration! Play stick games and understand what is the real fight! Win and use them in the fight against the enemies! Just pick the skin and show the skills of warriors! Shoot to kil

FEATURES
Play online with friends and warriors from all over the world
Participate in stick fighting games just now
Complete all levels and get a 5 bonus levels
Get new skins
Use weapons and boosters for more power
Realistic physics, which is breathtaking from the first minute
Multiplayer : play with your friends
Play for free and destroy the enemies!
